fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *, 
    split(supplier_product_details, '\\|')[0] AS Product_Id,
    split(supplier_product_details, '\\|')[1] AS Supplier_Address_Label,
    split(supplier_product_details, '\\|')[2] AS Supplier_Id,
    split(supplier_product_details, '\\|')[3] AS part3,
    split(supplier_product_details, '\\|')[4] AS Product_Details
FROM fire_temp_table;

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
This workflow creates the Supplier Master Data. It would have the following fields:


  • Supplier id
  • Supplier name
  • Latitude
  • Longitude
  • Address Label
  • Product Id
  • Tube Length
  • Tube Thickness
  • Unit Cost
  • Minimun Volume comitted
  • Supplier Maximum Capacity
fields.title: Comment
fields.description: Comments for the Workflow

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    t1.InternalID AS Supplier_Id, 
    CONCAT(t1.Name, ' - ', t1.StateProvince, ' - ', UPPER(SUBSTRING(t1.City, 1, 1)) || LOWER(SUBSTRING(t1.City, 2))) AS Supplier_Name,
    t2.Supplier_Address_Label,
    t1.Latitude, 
    t1.Longitude, 
    REPLACE(LOWER(t1.AddressLabel), '-', '') AS AddressLabel,
    t2.Product_Details, 
    t2.Product_Id, 
    t2.Unit_Cost,
    t2.Price_Month,
    t2.Country,
    t1.StateProvince as Supplier_State
FROM 
    tempTable1 t1
JOIN 
    tempTable2 t2
ON 
    t1.AddressLabel = 
    	CASE t2.Supplier_Address_Label
            WHEN 'JR NEW ENERGY - TX Ship' THEN 'JR NEW ENERGY - TX Shipping'
            WHEN 'WHEATLAND AL - AL Shipp' THEN 'WHEATLAND AL - AL Shipping'
            ELSE t2.Supplier_Address_Label
        END
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    Product_Id,
    Supplier_Address_Label,
    Supplier_Id,
    part3,
    Product_Details,

    --  Latest available unit cost 
    ROUND(
        CASE
            WHEN Dec24 IS NOT NULL AND Dec24 > 0 THEN Dec24
            WHEN Nov24 IS NOT NULL AND Nov24 > 0 THEN Nov24
            WHEN Oct24 IS NOT NULL AND Oct24 > 0 THEN Oct24
            WHEN Sep24 IS NOT NULL AND Sep24 > 0 THEN Sep24
            WHEN Aug24 IS NOT NULL AND Aug24 > 0 THEN Aug24
            WHEN Jul24 IS NOT NULL AND Jul24 > 0 THEN Jul24
            WHEN Jun24 IS NOT NULL AND Jun24 > 0 THEN Jun24
            WHEN May24 IS NOT NULL AND May24 > 0 THEN May24
            WHEN Apr24 IS NOT NULL AND Apr24 > 0 THEN Apr24
            WHEN Mar24 IS NOT NULL AND Mar24 > 0 THEN Mar24
            WHEN Feb24 IS NOT NULL AND Feb24 > 0 THEN Feb24
            WHEN Jan24 IS NOT NULL AND Jan24 > 0 THEN Jan24
            ELSE NULL
        END, 2
    ) AS Unit_Cost,

    --  The corresponding month from which Unit_Cost came
    CASE
    	WHEN Dec24 IS NOT NULL AND Dec24 > 0 THEN 'Dec24'
        WHEN Nov24 IS NOT NULL AND Nov24 > 0 THEN 'Nov24'
        WHEN Oct24 IS NOT NULL AND Oct24 > 0 THEN 'Oct24'
        WHEN Sep24 IS NOT NULL AND Sep24 > 0 THEN 'Sep24'
        WHEN Aug24 IS NOT NULL AND Aug24 > 0 THEN 'Aug24'
        WHEN Jul24 IS NOT NULL AND Jul24 > 0 THEN 'Jul24'
        WHEN Jun24 IS NOT NULL AND Jun24 > 0 THEN 'Jun24'
        WHEN May24 IS NOT NULL AND May24 > 0 THEN 'May24'
        WHEN Apr24 IS NOT NULL AND Apr24 > 0 THEN 'Apr24'
        WHEN Mar24 IS NOT NULL AND Mar24 > 0 THEN 'Mar24'
        WHEN Feb24 IS NOT NULL AND Feb24 > 0 THEN 'Feb24'
        WHEN Jan24 IS NOT NULL AND Jan24 > 0 THEN 'Jan24'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS Price_Month

FROM fire_temp_table;

    Supplier_Address_Label,
    Supplier_Id,
    part3,
    Product_Details,
    TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(Product_Id, '-', 1)) AS Product_Id,
    TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(Product_Id, '-', -1)) AS Country,
    Unit_Cost,
    Price_Month
FROM fire_temp_table;

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT
    t1.*, 
    t2.*
FROM 
    tempTable1 t1
JOIN 
    tempTable2 t2
    ON (LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE CONCAT('%', LOWER(t1.Supplier), '%')
       OR (t1.Supplier = 'Atkore' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%atkore%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'JM Steel PA' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%jm%steel%pa%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'JM Steel TX' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%jm%steel%tx%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'JR New Energy' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%jr%new%energy%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'JZNEE' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%jznee%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'MSS' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%mss%steel%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Nextrise' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%nextrise%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Priefert' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%priefert%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Recodeal' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%recodeal%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Unimacts' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%unimacts%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'WTEC' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%wtec%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Wheatland AL' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%wheatland%al%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Wheatland IL' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%wheatland%il%')
        OR (t1.Supplier = 'Yatai' AND LOWER(t2.AddressLabel) LIKE '%yatai%'));
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(supplier_name, '-', 1)) AS Supplier_Company,
    Supplier_State AS State,
    TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(Supplier_Name, '-', -1)) AS City

FROM fire_temp_table;

fields.description: Whether the file has a header row

fields.description: Whether to drop the Special Characters and Spaces in Column Name.

fields.title: Mode
fields.description: Mode for dealing with corrupt records during parsing.

fields.name: enforceSchema
fields.title: Enforce Schema
fields.description: If it is set to true, the specified or inferred schema will be forcibly applied to datasource files, and headers in CSV files will be ignored. If the option is set to false, the schema will be validated against all headers in CSV files in the case when the header option is set to true.

fields.name: addInputFileName
fields.title: Whether to Add Input File Name as Column in the Dataframe
fields.description: Add the new field:input_file_name

fields.name: encoding
fields.title: Encoding
fields.description: Decodes the CSV files by the given encoding type

fields.name: quote
fields.title: Quote
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quoted values where the separator can be part of the value

fields.name: escape
fields.title: Escape
fields.description: Sets a single character used for escaping quotes inside an already quoted value.

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    REPLACE(REPLACE(supplier_new, 'JM', 'JM Steel'), 'Jinrun', 'JR New Energy') AS Supplier_updated
FROM fire_temp_table;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: tempTable
fields.title: Temp Table
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    *,
    SUBSTRING_INDEX(Supplier, ' ', 1) AS supplier_new,
    TRIM(SUBSTRING(Supplier, LOCATE(' ', Supplier) + 1)) AS state
FROM fire_temp_table;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

nodes.name: Join Using SQL
nodes.description: This node registers the incoming DataFrames as temporary tables and executes the SQL provided

fields.name: storageLevel
fields.title: Output Storage Level
fields.description: Storage Level of the Output Datasets of this Node

fields.name: tempTables
fields.title: Temp Table Names
fields.description: Temp Table Name to be used

fields.name: sql
fields.value:
SELECT 
    a.*, 
    b.*
FROM 
    tempTable1 a
JOIN 
    tempTable2 b
ON 
    TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(a.Supplier_new, ' ', 1)) = TRIM(SUBSTRING_INDEX(b.Supplier, ' ', 1))  
AND 
    a.State_new = b.State  

where b.Supplier_Name != "Unimacts Global LLC - NV - Las vegas"                           
;
fields.title: SQL
fields.description: SQL to be run

fields.name: comment
fields.value:
Merged Master supplier data with supplier min order column (25_Vol) from the STL_Planning Guidelines_US_TTU_alloc_guideline Raw data file.

The supplier Atkore and JZNEE have values 0 as the Raw input file had Null values
